name: Survey Log Identifier
description: This module enables the addition of an identifier into the REDCap logs when data are created or updated in REDCap survey instruments.

project-settings.name: Choose the survey(s) you want to add identifiers to as well as the field that will serve as the identifier.

sub_settings.name: Choose the event to which this combination of field and instrument(s) applies
Survey instrument(s) on which to add identifiers (leave blank to apply module to all surveys in the project)
The field that holds the identifier that will appear in the logs (leave blank to use project's record ID field). Note, this field must not appear on a repeatable instrument or event
Text to prepend to the identifier value
